snippet: An anti-abortion group has a free speech right to release covert video of discussions with a company that provides fetal tissue for research.
abstract: Los Angles Judge Joanne O'Donnell rules anti-abortion group Center for Medical Progress has right to release video showing employees of research company StemExpress discussing fetal tissue purchases connected to Planned Parenthood; StemExpress sought to block video on grounds it was recorded secretly.
lead_paragraph: An anti-abortion group has a free speech right to release covert video of discussions with a company that provides fetal tissue for research.

headline.main: California: Judge Allows Release of Secretly Filmed Videos
headline.print_headline: California: Judge Allows Release of Secretly Filmed Videos
